alert.note: Alert for Graham (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 11:53AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Graham County through 1215 PM CDT... At 1153 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Bogue, or 7 miles northeast of Hill City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Nicodemus around 1205 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for northwestern Kansas.
